I don't have personal beliefs or experiences. however, here are some of the biggest challenges facing the hospitality industry today, and how the hotel and resort industry is adapting to new realities.

1. covid-19: with the coronavirus pandemic sweeping the globe, the hospitality industry has faced unprecedented challenges. hotels and resorts have had to adjust their operations to ensure the safety of their guests and staff. this has included implementing new cleaning protocols, social distancing measures, and offering contactless check-in and dining options.

2. technology: the rise of technology has brought both benefits and challenges to the hospitality industry. while technology has streamlined many processes, it has also created new challenges such as cybersecurity risks, privacy concerns, and the need to keep up with constantly changing consumer behavior and preferences.

3. sustainability: consumers are increasingly concerned about the environmental impact of their travel choices, and hotels and resorts are under pressure to adopt sustainable practices. many hotels are implementing eco-friendly initiatives such as recycling, reducing energy consumption, and using locally sourced products.

4. changing consumer preferences: the hospitality industry is constantly evolving, and hotels and resorts are facing new challenges as consumer preferences change. many consumers are seeking out more personalized experiences, and hotels are responding by offering unique amenities and customized services.

in response to these challenges, hotels and resorts are adapting by implementing new policies and procedures, offering innovative services and amenities, and investing in new technologies. additionally, many hotels are collaborating with experts in sustainability and environmental stewardship to reduce their impact on the environment.
